title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.18 - Cost apportionment to states
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.18 - Cost apportionment to states

State Regulations

The commission will determine the states within which the
general benefits of such water-supply facilities will accrue. It will apportion
to such states their fair share of the non-federal cost of such facilities in
proportion to the use thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
